tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_title TEXT,
    likes INT DEFAULT 0,
    comments INT DEFAULT 0,
    shares INT DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE post_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);
